tool_description: Manages integration with external vendors and partners for reward fulfillment including vendor credentials, API configurations, fulfillment methods, and service level agreements.

vendor_name.description: Name of the vendor or partner organization

vendor_type.description: Type of vendor: gift_card_provider, merchandise_supplier, experience_provider, digital_content, service_provider

api_endpoint.description: Primary API endpoint URL for vendor integration

authentication_method.description: Authentication method: api_key, oauth, basic_auth, certificate

fulfillment_method.description: How rewards are fulfilled: instant_digital, physical_shipping, voucher_code, api_activation

sla_fulfillment_hours.description: Service level agreement for fulfillment time in hours

supported_regions.description: Array of region codes where vendor can fulfill orders

test_mode.description: Whether to use vendor's test/sandbox environment

webhook_url.description: Webhook URL for receiving fulfillment status updates

cost_markup_percentage.description: Markup percentage applied to vendor costs (0-100)

minimum_order_value.description: Minimum order value required by vendor

error_messages: Invalid vendor_name: Vendor name must be 2-100 characters long.
Invalid vendor_type: Must be one of [gift_card_provider, merchandise_supplier, experience_provider, digital_content, service_provider].
Invalid api_endpoint: Must be a valid HTTPS URL if provided.
Invalid authentication_method: Must be one of [api_key, oauth, basic_auth, certificate] if provided.
Invalid fulfillment_method: Must be one of [instant_digital, physical_shipping, voucher_code, api_activation].
Invalid sla_fulfillment_hours: Must be a positive integer between 1-720 (30 days).
Invalid supported_regions: Must contain valid ISO country codes.
Invalid webhook_url: Must be a valid HTTPS URL if provided.
Invalid minimum_order_value: Must be a positive number if specified.
Vendor already exists: A vendor with this name is already configured.
usage: Provide vendor_name, vendor_type, and fulfillment_method as required parameters. Configure API integration with api_endpoint and authentication_method. Set supported_regions for geographic restrictions and sla_fulfillment_hours for service expectations. Use test_mode during initial setup and integration testing.

vendor_id.description: Unique identifier for the vendor configuration

integration_status.description: Status of vendor integration (connected, pending, failed, test_mode)

configuration_summary.description: Summary of vendor configuration and capabilities

test_connection_result.description: Result of initial connection test with vendor API

estimated_setup_time.description: Estimated time to complete full vendor integration setup
